title: Bancor app ends up with blank screen (android)
body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: Bug with Bancor is leading to slow load on iOS and blank screen on Android. Remove Bancor from curated DApp list until this issue is resolved. 

#### Expected behavior

Bancor no longer appears on DApp list until I can use it on Android.

#### Actual behavior

Bancor still appears in DApp list. Blank screen on Android:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/41543854-62dc3342-7320-11e8-9ecb-90c9f9bed75c.png)


### Reproduction

- Open Status on Android
- Open Bancor dapp

Same for me, I'm testing on S8, Android 7.0.

**Logcat**


Our users also report it ([Instabug](https://dashboard.instabug.com/applications/status-6b2838c6-8064-445d-ae12-3c35e96f3a69/beta/bugs/494)). @flexsurfer could you take a look at it? Nastya suggested removing this dapp until the problem is fixed.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
it still can't be opened on Android in os native browser
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
8 months later, this is still an issue, and the app is still in the list.

Bancor doesn't work in Android's WebView, period (Tried Android 8.0, 9.0). There is nothing wrong with our code.

It works in Chrome though, so probably it uses some API that is available there but not in the system WebView. Maybe this PR will help, we will see: https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/7515
